short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension developed by IbisVision to provide a messaging channel for the kiosk test suite.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension was developed for anyone that decides to use the Ibis Vision Kiosk application to perform eye tests. This extension allow the communication between the 2 parts of the application in case they are opened in separate independent windows. Basically the extension exchange messages back and forth based on the listening of custom events.
